objects.description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has developed custom malware for use in their operations.(Citation: CISA AppleJeus Feb 2021)(Citation: ESET Lazarus Jun 2020)(Citation: Google TAG Lazarus Jan 2021)(Citation: ClearSky Lazarus Aug 2020)
